snippets.content:
I am a full-stack software engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications and distributed systems. I specialize in React, TypeScript, Rust, and cloud-native architectures.

Previously, I led engineering teams at two Y Combinator startups, shipping products used by over 500,000 developers worldwide. I'm passionate about developer tooling, performance optimization, and open-source contributions.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me mentoring junior developers, speaking at tech conferences, or experimenting with new programming languages. I believe great software is built at the intersection of empathy and engineering rigor.

Best regards,

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or need further clarification. I'm happy to schedule a follow-up call at your convenience.

Warm regards

Code Review Feedback

Overall: Looks good! A few suggestions below.

Strengths:
- Clean separation of concerns
- Good test coverage
- Clear naming conventions

Suggestions:
- Consider extracting the helper logic into a utility module
- Add error handling for edge cases
- Update the README with the new API changes

Approved with minor changes.
